entry.title: Growing Pains
entry.summary:
Author: Claire1999

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,019Chapters: 2/10Kudos: 2

Summary: “You’re not a child anymore.”This remark irked Damian, but this time, he didn’t push the man’s hand away. Instead, he parted his lips and gently bit down on the cigarette’s filter, looking up at the man, waiting for the cigarette to be lit.
